languages.text:
If a hive world character starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} adjacent to an ally character, that hive world character gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
If a hive world character ends their turn adjacent to allies, they all gain +2 MP on their next turn.
languages.original_text:
Если в начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа с мира-улья на соседней клетке находится союзник, то персонаж получает +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очка передвижения{/g}.
Если персонаж с мира-улья завершает ход рядом с союзниками, то и он, и союзники получают +2 ОП в следующий ход.

traits.locale_text:
If a hive world character starts their turn adjacent to an ally character, that hive world character gains +2 MP.
If a hive world character ends their turn adjacent to allies, they all gain +2 MP on their next turn.

If a hive world character starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} adjacent to an ally character, that hive world character gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
If a hive world character ends their turn adjacent to allies, they all gain +2 MP on their next turn.

If a hive world character starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} adjacent to an ally character, that hive world character gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
If a hive world character ends their turn adjacent to allies, they all gain +2 MP on their next turn.

languages.text:
Wenn ein Makropolwelt-Charakter seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} neben einem verbündeten Charakter beginnt, erhält dieser Makropolwelt-Charakter +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.
Wenn ein Makropolwelt-Charakter seinen Zug angrenzend an Verbündete beendet, erhalten alle in ihrem nächsten Zug +2 BP.
languages.original_text:
If a hive world character starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} adjacent to an ally character, that hive world character gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
If a hive world character ends their turn adjacent to allies, they all gain +2 MP on their next turn.

traits.locale_text:
Wenn ein Makropolwelt-Charakter seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} neben einem verbündeten Charakter beginnt, erhält dieser Makropolwelt-Charakter +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.
Wenn ein Makropolwelt-Charakter seinen Zug angrenzend an Verbündete beendet, erhalten alle in ihrem nächsten Zug +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}BP{/g}.

languages.text:
Si un personnage issu d'un monde ruche commence son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} sur une case adjacente à celle d'un allié, le personnage issu du monde ruche obtient +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.
Si un personnage issu d'un monde ruche termine son tour sur une case adjacente à celle de ses alliés, tous obtiennent +2 PD lors de leur tour suivant.
languages.original_text:
If a hive world character starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} adjacent to an ally character, that hive world character gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
If a hive world character ends their turn adjacent to allies, they all gain +2 MP on their next turn.

traits.locale_text:
Si un personnage issu d'un monde ruche commence son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} sur une case adjacente à celle d'un allié, le personnage issu du monde ruche obtient +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.
Si un personnage issu d'un monde ruche termine son tour sur une case adjacente à celle de ses alliés, tous obtiennent +2 PD lors de leur tour suivant.

languages.text:
如果巢都世界的角色在{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时周围有盟友，则此角色获得+2{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。
如果巢都世界的角色在回合结束时与盟友相邻，则所有相邻盟友下回合都会获得+2移动点数。
languages.original_text:
If a hive world character starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} adjacent to an ally character, that hive world character gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
If a hive world character ends their turn adjacent to allies, they all gain +2 MP on their next turn.

traits.locale_text:
如果巢都世界的角色在{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时周围有盟友，则此角色获得+2{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。
如果巢都世界的角色在回合结束时与盟友相邻，则所有相邻盟友下回合都会获得+2{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}移动点数{/g}。

languages.text:
Si un personaje de mundo colmena empieza su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} adyacente a un personaje aliado, el personaje de mundo colmena gana +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}.
Si un personaje de mundo colmena termina su turno con aliados adyacentes, todos ganan +2 PM en su siguiente turno.
languages.original_text:
If a hive world character starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} adjacent to an ally character, that hive world character gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
If a hive world character ends their turn adjacent to allies, they all gain +2 MP on their next turn.

traits.locale_text:
Si un personaje de mundo colmena empieza su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} adyacente a un personaje aliado, el personaje de mundo colmena gana +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}.
Si un personaje de mundo colmena termina su turno con aliados adyacentes, todos ganan +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}PM{/g} en su siguiente turno.

languages.text:
過密惑星のキャラクターが味方キャラクターと隣接した状態で{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を開始た時、その過密惑星のキャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が+2される。
過密惑星のキャラクターが味方と隣接した状態でターンを終えた時、味方全員は次のターンにMPが+2される。
languages.original_text:

過密惑星のキャラクターが味方と隣接した状態でターンを終えた時、味方全員は次のターンに{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}MP{/g}が+2される。
